company_info.name: Physics Wallah
company_info.description: Physics Wallah (PW) is India's leading EdTech platform, democratizing education at scale. We provide high-quality, affordable learning for JEE, NEET, UPSC, and more.
company_info.mission: To provide quality education to every child in India, regardless of their financial background.

verticals.name: JEE (Joint Entrance Examination)
verticals.description: Comprehensive preparation for JEE Mains and Advanced. Batches include Arjuna (11th), Lakshya (12th), and Prayas (Droppers).

verticals.name: NEET (National Eligibility cum Entrance Test)
verticals.description: Top-tier medical entrance coaching. Batches include Yakeen (Droppers), Arjuna (11th), and Lakshya (12th).

verticals.name: Foundation (Class 9 & 10)
verticals.description: Building strong fundamentals for Boards and future competitive exams like NTSE and Olympiads.

verticals.name: UPSC (Union Public Service Commission)
verticals.description: Affordable and result-oriented coaching for Civil Services Examination.

verticals.name: PW Skills
verticals.description: Upskilling courses in Data Science, Full Stack Web Development, Java, C++, and more to make you industry-ready.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure?
faqs.answer: Our batches are extremely affordable, starting from as low as ₹3000 to ₹4500 for a full year course. Please check the PW App for the latest offers.

faqs.question: Do you provide study material?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive DPPs (Daily Practice Problems), PDF notes, and optional hard copy modules delivered to your doorstep.

faqs.question: Is there doubt support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have a dedicated doubt engine where you can ask questions and get video solutions instantly.

faqs.question: Can I watch recorded lectures?
faqs.answer: Yes, all live classes are recorded and available for you to watch anytime, as many times as you want.
